title: Create Jujutsu Kaisen Culling Game battle system

requirements.text: Create a game arena where Jujutsu Kaisen characters can engage in turn-based combat during the Culling Games

quotes: Make an game app about Jujutsu Kaisen and how the characters fight while they're in the calling games

acceptanceCriteria: Game arena is visually rendered with a Culling Games theme
Players can see character models or representations on screen
Combat interface allows for turn-based actions

requirements.text: Implement a roster of playable Jujutsu Kaisen characters with unique abilities and stats (include at least Yuji Itadori, Megumi Fushiguro, Nobara Kugisaki, and Maki Zenin)

quotes: Jujutsu Kaisen and how the characters fight

acceptanceCriteria: Each character has distinct stats (health, attack, defense, cursed energy)
Each character has at least 2-3 unique cursed techniques or abilities
Character data is stored and retrievable from the backend

requirements.text: Create a combat system where players can select actions (attack, defend, use cursed technique, or special move) during their turn
acceptanceCriteria: Players can view available actions for their selected character
Action selection triggers appropriate combat calculations in the backend
Combat results are displayed with visual feedback

requirements.text: Implement a points system reflecting the Culling Games rules where defeating opponents earns points

quotes: while they're in the calling games

acceptanceCriteria: Points are awarded when a character defeats an opponent
Point totals are tracked per player/character
Points determine winner or rankings

requirements.text: Design a character selection screen where players can choose their fighter before entering the arena

quotes: Jujutsu Kaisen and how the characters fight

acceptanceCriteria: Character roster is displayed with portraits or avatars
Players can click to select a character
Selected character's abilities and stats are previewed

requirements.text: Create a battle UI that displays character health bars, cursed energy meters, available abilities, and turn indicators
acceptanceCriteria: Health and cursed energy are shown as visual bars or meters
Current turn is clearly indicated
Ability buttons are interactive and show cooldowns or costs

requirements.text: Apply a distinctive dark fantasy anime-inspired visual theme with bold contrasts, dramatic lighting, and a gritty combat aesthetic that evokes the Jujutsu Kaisen universe and Culling Games atmosphere
acceptanceCriteria: Color palette uses dark tones with vibrant accent colors (reds, purples, electric blues)
Typography is bold and dramatic, suitable for combat scenarios
Layout emphasizes intensity and action with dynamic visual elements

constraints: Use only single-actor Motoko backend architecture
Do not modify immutable frontend paths (useInternetIdentity, useActor, main.tsx, components/ui)
nonGoals: Integration with external Jujutsu Kaisen APIs or databases
